TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OuterGlowBitmapEffect extends System.Windows.Media.Effects.BitmapEffect
Public NotInheritable Class OuterGlowBitmapEffect Inherits BitmapEffect

summary.span: 注意：此 API 现已过时。
未过时的替代项为 。
围绕对象或颜色区域创建颜色光环。

span.span: Creates a halo of color around objects or areas of color.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 位图效果是呈现的软件。 bitmap effects are software rendered. 应用效果的任何对象也都将以软件形式呈现。Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software. 不应将位图效果应用到大型视觉对象或动画，因为这可能会降低性能。Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations because this can degrade performance. 是一个附带的多种效果[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_lhsdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-lhsdk-md.md)]。 is one of several effects that are shipped with the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_lhsdk](~/includes/tla2sharptla-lhsdk-md.md)]. 其他影响包括：Other effects include: - - - - 如下图所示应用于视觉对象 (在这种情况下应用于)。The following illustration shows an applied to a visual object (in this case applied to a ). ![屏幕快照： OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果](~/add/media/effects-outerglowsimple.png "屏幕快照： OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果")![Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect](~/add/media/effects-outerglowsimple.png "Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect") 下图显示了几个基本属性的影响。The following illustrations show the effect of several basic properties of . - 属性指定光环发光的大小：The property specifies the size of the halo glow: ![屏幕快照： OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果](~/add/media/effects-outerglowglowsize.png "屏幕快照： OuterGlowBitmapEffect 位图效果")![Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect](~/add/media/effects-outerglowglowsize.png "Screenshot: OuterGlowBitmapEffect bitmap effect") - 属性指定的干扰级别发光中：The property specifies the level of noise in the glow: ![屏幕快照： 比较 Noise 属性值](~/add/media/effects-outerglownoise.png "屏幕快照： 比较 Noise 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare Noise property values](~/add/media/effects-outerglownoise.png "Screenshot: Compare Noise property values") - 属性指定如何透明发光是：The property specifies how transparent the glow is: ![屏幕快照： 比较发光不透明度属性值](~/add/media/effects-outerglowopacity.png "屏幕快照： 比较发光不透明度属性值")![Screenshot: Compare glow opacity property values](~/add/media/effects-outerglowopacity.png "Screenshot: Compare glow opacity property values")

span.span: Gets or sets the thickness of the halo glow.
The thickness of the halo glow, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)].
The valid range of values is from 1 through 199.

summary.span: 注意：此 API 现已过时。
未过时的替代项为 。
获取或设置光环发光的颗粒度。

span.span: Gets or sets the graininess of the halo glow.

value.span: 光环发光的颗粒度（噪音级别）。

span.span: The graininess (noise level) of the halo glow.

value.span: 值的有效范围是从 0.0 到 1.0，其中 0.0 指无噪音，1.0 指最大噪音。

span.span: The valid range of values is from 0.0 through 1.0, with 0.0 specifying no noise and 1.0 specifying maximum noise.

value.span: 值 0.5 表示 50% 噪音，值 0.75 表示 75% 噪音，依此类推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent noise, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent noise, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果。The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property. ![屏幕快照： 比较 Noise 属性值](~/add/media/effects-outerglownoise.png "屏幕快照： 比较 Noise 属性值")![Screenshot: Compare Noise property values](~/add/media/effects-outerglownoise.png "Screenshot: Compare Noise property values") ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double Opacity { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.Opacity : double with get, set

summary.span: 注意：此 API 现已过时。
未过时的替代项为 。
获取或设置光环发光的不透明度。

span.span: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of the halo glow.
The opacity level of the glow.

value.span: 如果值为 0，则表示光环发光完全透明；如果值为 1，则表示发光完全不透明。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that the halo glow is completely transparent, while a value of 1 indicates that the glow is completely opaque.

value.span: 如果值为 0.5，则表示发光不透明度为 50%；如果值为 0.725，则表示发光不透明度为 72.5%，依此类推。

span.span: A value of 0.5 indicates the glow is 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates the glow is 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.

value.span: 小于 0 的值将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。

span.span: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下图演示了此属性的效果：The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property: ![屏幕快照： 比较发光不透明度属性值](~/add/media/effects-outerglowopacity.png "屏幕快照： 比较发光不透明度属性值")![Screenshot: Compare glow opacity property values](~/add/media/effects-outerglowopacity.png "Screenshot: Compare glow opacity property values") 此外可以使用的 alpha 值指定不透明度。Opacity can also be specified using the alpha value of . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|
